body: How much do Emerald donors have to pay to donate for Diamond? I'm talking about the Emerald's who get to keep their rank forever.
body_tagged: How much do Emerald donors have to pay to donate for Diamond? I'm talking about the Emerald's who get to keep their rank forever.
title: Emerald Upgrades...?

replies.body: I'm guessing you would need to buy another emerald and get it combined for diamond unless you want to fully pay for diamond. But don't quote me 100% on it :)
replies.body_tagged: I'm guessing you would need to buy another emerald and get it combined for diamond unless you want to fully pay for diamond. But don't quote me 100% on it :)

replies.body:
I found this out last night but apparently Avicus doesn't offer upgrades anymore for ranks. If you want diamond you will have to buy diamond for the full $50

EDIT: directly from the shop page

EDIT: directly from the shop page

replies.body: It's $50, and you can mix the ranks together from what I'm being told off the shop

replies.body: seems like a huge hassle that way, what is so hard about upgrades?

replies.body: Mixing ranks? Isn't that a bit op? Gold+emerald+diamond=1.5x*2x*2.5x= 7.5x= omg thats a bit op in terms of credit boost o.O or even if it didn't multiply the added ranks: 1.5+2+2.5=5x. Op from what I can see... P2W?
replies.body_tagged: Mixing ranks? Isn't that a bit op? Gold+emerald+diamond=1.5x*2x*2.5x= 7.5x= omg thats a bit op in terms of credit boost o.O or even if it didn't multiply the added ranks: 1.5+2+2.5=5x. Op from what I can see... P2W?

replies.body: The ranks have different durations, upgrading wouldn't make much sense. For those who have a permanent rank, you can have both Emerald and Diamond by purchasing Diamond. The multiplier isn't doubled or anything. Shows your support with multiple ranks.
replies.body_tagged: The ranks have different durations, upgrading wouldn't make much sense. For those who have a permanent rank, you can have both Emerald and Diamond by purchasing Diamond. The multiplier isn't doubled or anything. Shows your support with multiple ranks.

replies.body: Sorry, jus t'was a bit confused by idea of having multiple 'multipliers' :/ thanks for letting me know
replies.body_tagged: Sorry, jus t'was a bit confused by idea of having multiple 'multipliers' :/ thanks for letting me know
